scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Luke, identified by his halo and the act of writing, seated indoors and diligently working on a scroll. He is dressed in a blue tunic and a red cloak, with a red cap on his head. Beside him, a winged ox, his traditional symbol, rests on the floor. The setting is an interior space with a wooden desk holding an open book and the scroll. Behind the desk, a wall with decorative panels and windows with latticed panes is visible. The scene is framed by an arched architectural element adorned with floral motifs.
